channel.title: (D) E S T O R T I O N | A lot of features | Amazing base | User Friendly | GOOD
channel.description:
[center][img]http://destortion.com/images/Destortion.png[/img]
[ADMIN=Summary][B]Destortion was a project under development based on the [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/506313-pi-biohazard-317-474-look-like-fishing-trawler-skilling-close-perfect.html"]Bio hazard[/URL] source released by [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/mrclassic/"]MrClassic[/URL]. We intend to take this source & create something truly great within a PI base. We realize that [I][COLOR="#FFA500"]"Rome wasn't built in a day."[/COLOR][/I] We don't intend to rush anything as we want to perfect every slight detail to give our players an experience like none other. We are hard working & dedicated people that don't let anything affect us, therefore, I announce the official development thread of Destortion.[/B][/ADMIN]
[ADMIN=Involvements][B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"] DEVELOPERS[/COLOR][/B]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YgNzZ5u.png[/img][B][COLOR="#993399"]Mob Klick[/COLOR][/B]
[B][COLOR="#FFFFFF"]CREDITS[/COLOR][/B]
[URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/members/mrclassic/"]MrClassic[/URL][/admin]
[b]If you want to show your support, it is appreciated if you click the [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/IHqKtBi.png[/img] button[/b]
You can rep If you want It's not needed though I am not rep hungry just stating that ahead of time. Would be appreciated If you thanked the thread though :) (y)
I am releasing this base for many reasons It's very easy to setup and it will be good to host as well do more to. If you need help feel free to PM here I will help! [/CENTER]
[COLOR="#00FF00"][CENTER]Leech it all you want just give proper credits. MrClassic will get a lot mainly because it's his base I started with. [/CENTER][/COLOR]
[CENTER]The source it self has a decent a mount of features I will post some pictures so you can see It as well. A lot was done to it in so little time.
If you thought this was good let me know I will be releasing more sources. Was thinking about releasing DiversityX as I have no time to continue that to too much.
[COLOR="#FF0000"][B][U][SIZE=5]Media [/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/54A75.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/54AkQ.jpg[/img]

[IMG]http://puu.sh/54AH7.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/54APa.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/54ASI.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/56eE6.png[/img]
Link to the project thread [URL=http://"http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/518503-d-estortion-best-best-eco-professional-development-team-enjoyable.html"]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/projects/518503-d-estortion-best-best-eco-professional-development-team-enjoyable.html[/URL]
Tell me what you think. Here is the download links (y) ENJOY!
[url=http://uppit.com/xkwyy3mj068a/Destortion_Package.rar]Download Destortion.Package.rar @ UppIT[/url]
Please note this is the full package server, cache as well as the client (y). You will have to use the cache provided and disable the auto cache downloader because it's older without the stuff added into it some stuff MAY not work If you let it auto download ;) Consider yourself warned ahead of time :p [/CENTER]
[B][U][COLOR="#FF0000"][SIZE=5]IF I MISSED CREDITS LET ME KNOW![/SIZE][/COLOR][/U][/B]

item.dc:creator: @Titanium1 Titanium_
item.description:
@Titanium1 wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Funny how you moparians don’t know shit. This is Biohazard with my changes. As well Ardeche PK is valentinos but it was accquital’s to begin with. People really need to learn their damn sources.

Not know their sources lmfao? Most of the Moparians+ here have had loads of programming background knowledge. I for one am not amused with this source as nothing is “Custom”, “unique” or “Original” lmfao.

Thanks for the release though.
